Package controllers

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.HomeController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepoDataServiceTest.FakeRepoClient, TopicDataServiceTest.FakeTopicClient
    public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    HomeController is the Controller that handles the HTTP requests for searching for information on given topic, for fetching the repository data, for fetching the repository issues, for fetching the Topics data, and for fetching the User Data.
    Author:
    Harman Preet Kaur, Manan Dineshbhai Paruthi, Yashwanth Gundlapally, Kevinkumar Patel
